summary:
I heard someone describe an artist as "someone who never takes a break from being an artist”. 
I think that's an excellent description.  As everyday bloggers, we may not call ourselves artists, but we can certainly call ourselves creators...
title: We Blog 24/7

summary: Learn how to automatically mark external links with a `↗` symbol using Hugo's link render-hook templates and a CSS solution for Bear
title: Adding External Link Markers in Hugo and Bear

summary: Yes, your privacy is under assault, but unless you are willing to take certain uncomfortable steps, quit making everyone miserable with performative hysterics
title: I Have Some Strong Opinions on Privacy Freak Outs
